title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: A story about a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gol D Roger.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Set in a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the sudden appearance of the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Tells the tale of a young boy named Goku, as he embarks on a quest to find the seven Dragon Balls, which summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: A story about alchemy and two brothers' quest.
